item.description: About At the citadel of Qaitbay akregeb at gmail dot com Hi! I’m Ahmed and I work on optimization and machine learning. I got my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering from Cairo University, Egypt in August 2020. I was fortunate to intern in the group of Prof. Peter Richt√°rik at KAUST in the summer of 2019 where I worked on the distributed & stochastic optimization. Prior to this, I did some (applied) research on accelerating the training of neural networks with Prof.
